app.title: Fact 5

app.description: Test your knowledge with daily trivia challenges

instructions.revealNew: Reveal a new fact to make another guess...

status.longRequest: Still processing... This is taking a bit longer than usual
status.duplicate: You've already tried that guess. Try something else!
status.skipConfirm: Are you sure you want to skip? Click again to confirm.
status.rotateDescription: This game works best in portrait mode on smaller screens. Please rotate your device to continue playing.

wrongAnswer.noGuessesLeft: No guesses left! Time for the Final Five!

finalFive.title: FINAL 5
finalFive.instructions: Select the correct fact for each category

finalFive.guessesUp: 5 guesses down, but victory awaits in the FINAL 5! You'll have {{timeLimit}} seconds to pick the right answer from 5 options. This is your moment to shine!

finalFive.incorrectAnswer: Incorrect. The correct answer is highlighted.

settings.cannotChangeDifficulty: Cannot change difficulty after game has started
settings.languageLocked: Language cannot be changed after making a guess

landscapeWarning.title: Rotate Your Device
landscapeWarning.gameMessage: This game is best experienced in portrait mode. Please rotate your device to continue playing.

welcome.title: Welcome to Fact 5!
welcome.description: Discover hidden facts and use your deductive skills to solve the daily puzzle. Each day brings a new challenge to test your knowledge!

category.title: Daily Category
category.description: Today's mystery category is shown here. Your goal is to figure out what connects all the facts you'll discover. What could it be?

factCards.title: Fact Cards
factCards.description: As you reveal facts, they'll appear here. Click any revealed card to review its information.

hiddenFacts.title: Hidden Facts
hiddenFacts.description: These bubbles contain hidden facts that will help you solve the category.

revealFacts.title: Reveal Facts
revealFacts.description: Drag any bubble to the card area to reveal its fact! Start with this one to begin your journey.

guesses.title: Make Your Guesses
guesses.description: Type your guesses here. Try to figure out what category matches all the facts you discover!

description.normal: You have 5 minutes to solve the puzzle. Keep an eye on the timer to track your remaining time!
description.hard: You have 55 seconds to solve the puzzle in hard mode. Keep an eye on the timer to track your remaining time!

guessLimit.title: Guess Limit
guessLimit.description: You have 5 guesses to solve the puzzle. The progress bar shows how many guesses you have left.

tools.title: Helpful Tools
tools.description: Use the info button (i) to learn more about fact categories, or the skip button to pass on a guess if you're stuck.
